smc.freeimage test data
=======================

Note
----

The test files are large and therefore not included in the source
distribution. All files are available in the mercurial repository.

images
------

The test images are taken from various s<e>mantics projects:

* collection Ponickau, 17th century (university library Halle/Saale, Germany)

* Judaica collection Frankfurt (university library Frankfurt/Main, Germany)


ICC profiles
------------

The *.icm files are taken from LCMS 1.
